column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " It 's not getting away from me this time .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sshh !
#Text=Katara , you 're going to scare it away .
#Text=Mmmm ... I can already smell it cookin ' .
#Text=" Katara says : " But , Sokka !
#Text=I caught one !
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why is it that every time you play with magic water , I get soaked ?
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's not " magic " , it 's waterbending !
#Text=And it 's ... " Sokka says : " Yeah , yeah , " an ancient art unique to our culture " , blah , blah , blah .
#Text=Look , I 'm just saying that if I had weird powers , I 'd keep my weirdness to myself .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're calling me weird ?
#Text=I 'm not the one who makes muscles at myself every time I see my reflection in the water !
#Text=" Katara says : " Watch out !
#Text=Go left !
#Text=Go left !
#Text=" Katara says : " You call that left ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " You do n't like my steering ?
#Text=Well , maybe you should 've waterbended us out of the ice .
#Text=" Katara says : " So it 's my fault ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I knew I should 've left you home !
#Text=Leave it to a girl to screw things up !
#Text="
